horn.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the hard pointed thing that grows, usually in pairs, on the heads of animals such as cows and goats
horn.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the substance that animals’ horns are made of
horn.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: a knife with a horn handle
horn.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a part of an animal’s head that sticks out like a horn, for example on a snail
horn.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: the thing in a vehicle that you use to make a loud sound as a signal or warning
sound/toot/honk/blow your horn (=make a noise with your horn)
horn.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: a musical instrument like a long metal tube that is wide at one end, that you play by blowing
horn.translation[0].definitions[7].defin: a musical instrument made from an animal’s horn
